snippet: The Israeli military said shots were fired at an Israeli Army jeep in the Golan Heights, and a mortar shell landed in an open field.
abstract: Israeli military says its tanks fired into Syria in response to shots fired from Syrian side at an Israeli Army jeep in Israeli-held Golan Heights, adding that the shells hit their target.

byline.original: By ISABEL KERSHNER and NICK CUMMING-BRUCE
byline.contributor: Isabel Kershner reported from Jerusalem, and Nick Cumming-Bruce from Geneva.

lead_paragraph: The Israeli military said shots were fired at an Israeli Army jeep in the Golan Heights, and a mortar shell landed in an open field.

headline.seo: Israeli Tanks Respond to Shots Fired From Syrian Side
headline.main: Israel Says Its Tanks Responded to Shots Fired From Syrian Side
headline.print_headline: Israel Says Its Tanks Responded to Shots Fired From Syrian Side
